虫垂切除術: (ちゅうすいせつじょじゅつ) - appendectomy; appendisectomy; appendicectomy

虫干し: (むしぼし) - airing of clothes, hanging scrolls, etc. (to prevent damage from insects and mould)

虫酸: (むしず) - heartburn; strong sense of disgust
虫酸が走る: (むしずがはしる) - to be disgusted with; to loathe
虫食い: (むしくい) - worm-eaten/moth-eaten; holes eaten in clothing, leaves, etc. by caterpillars, moths, etc.; leaf warbler (any bird of genus Phylloscopus)/chiffchaff/willow wren
虫食む: (むしばむ) - to be worm-eaten/to be eaten by worms; to affect adversely/to spoil/to ruin/to undermine/to gnaw at (one's heart, body, etc.)/to eat into/to destroy
虬竜: (きゅうりょう) - mizuchi; mythical dragon-like beast
虱: (しつ) - Lice , louse (esp. um piolho sugador), lice
虱だらけ: (シラミだらけ) - lousy; lice-ridden; covered in lice

虱潰しに: (しらみつぶしに) - one by one; going over with a fine-tooth comb
虱蝿: (シラミバエ) - louse fly (any fly of family Hippoboscidae)
虱蠅: (シラミバエ) - louse fly (any fly of family Hippoboscidae)

虻蜂取らず: (あぶはちとらず) - attempting two tasks simultaneously, accomplishing neither

蚊取線香: (かとりせんこう) - mosquito coil; anti-mosquito incense

蚊母鳥: (ヨタカ) - grey nightjar (Caprimulgus indicus); nightjar (any bird of family Caprimulgidae)/goatsucker; (夜鷹 only) streetwalker/low class prostitute (Edo period); (夜鷹 only)   soba vendors who walk around at night/soba sold by these vendors

蚊燻り火: (かやりび) - smoky fire to repel mosquitoes
